SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.bookshelf

Interface IBookshelf

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Bookshelf, DynamicTestBookshelf
public interface IBookshelf extends Serializable
Represents a generic Bookshelf used by the players to store tiles.

    • dropTiles

      void dropTiles(List<GameTile> tilesToDrop, int column)
      Inserts tiles inside the bookshelf by occupying the first available spaces from the bottom.
      Parameters:
      tilesToDrop - list of tiles to drop in the bookshelf.
      column - column to drop the tiles in.

    • canDropTiles

      boolean canDropTiles(int numOfTiles, int column)
      Checks if the specified quantity of tiles can be dropped in the chosen column.
      Parameters:
      numOfTiles - number of tiles to drop.
      column - column to drop the tiles in.
      Returns:
      true if there's enough space inside the column.

    • hasTile

      boolean hasTile(int row, int column)
      Checks if the bookshelf contains a tile at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      row - row to check.
      column - column to check.
      Returns:
      true if the bookshelf contains a tile at the (row, column) coordinates.

    • compareTiles

      boolean compareTiles(int row, int column, int row2, int column2)
      Compares two tiles given their coordinates.
      Parameters:
      row - first row to check.
      column - first column to check.
      row2 - second row to check.
      column2 - second column to check.
      Returns:
      true if the tiles at the specified coordinates are the same.

    • decideTilesOrder

      List<GameTile> decideTilesOrder(List<GameTile> tilesToDrop, int position1, int position2, int position3)
      Chooses the order of the tiles
      Parameters:
      tilesToDrop - are the chosen tiles to insert
      position1 - is the position of the first tile
      position2 - is the position of the second tile
      position3 - is the position of the third tile
      Returns:
      sorted tiles to insert in the bookshelf
